header.title: Business Profile
header.description: Manage your company information and documents

tooltips.legalBusinessName: Your registered company name for legal and compliance purposes. This will be used in official communications and contracts.
tooltips.companyEmail: Official company email for business communications, notifications, and account recovery.
tooltips.website: Your company website URL. Used for verification and to provide customers with additional information.
tooltips.registeredAddress: Your official registered business address for legal correspondence and compliance requirements.
tooltips.gstNumber: Your tax identification number (GST/VAT/TIN) required for billing and tax compliance.
tooltips.adminPhoneNumber: Primary contact number with country code for account administration and urgent business matters (e.g., +1 234-567-8900).
tooltips.countryOfOperation: Primary country where your business operates. Used for compliance and service availability.
tooltips.industry: Your business industry sector. Helps us provide relevant features and comply with industry-specific regulations.
tooltips.companySize: Number of employees in your organization. Helps us tailor features and pricing to your business needs.
tooltips.aboutCompany: Brief description of your company, its mission, and services. Used for your public profile.
tooltips.documents: Business documents like certificates, licenses, or compliance documents. Stored securely for verification purposes.
